column1: Tell me about a time you overcame a challenge.
column2: n one group project, a teammate consistently missed deadlines. I set up a private 1-on-1 to understand what was going on. Turns out they were overwhelmed. I offered to pair-program during work sessions, and things improved. We ended up finishing the project ahead of time, and the communication got a lot better.
